100
//- - - - - - - - -//
%%
This is a comment block.
%%
//- - - - - - - - -//
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

101: Comment block between paragraphs
//- - - - - - - - -//
First paragraph.
%%
This is another comment block.
It spans multiple lines.
%%
Second paragraph.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>First paragraph.</p>
<p>Second paragraph.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

102: Comment block with trailing text
//- - - - - - - - -//
%%
This is a comment block.
%% With trailing text.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>With trailing text.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
